001package io.jstach.jstachio.spi;
002
003import java.lang.System.Logger;
004import java.lang.System.Logger.Level;
005import java.lang.annotation.Annotation;
006import java.lang.reflect.AnnotatedElement;
007import java.lang.reflect.Constructor;
008import java.util.EnumSet;
009import java.util.List;
010import java.util.Map;
011import java.util.Map.Entry;
012import java.util.NoSuchElementException;
013import java.util.ServiceLoader;
014import java.util.Set;
015import java.util.Spliterators.AbstractSpliterator;
016import java.util.function.Consumer;
017import java.util.function.Function;
018import java.util.stream.Stream;
019import java.util.stream.StreamSupport;
020
021import org.eclipse.jdt.annotation.NonNull;
022import org.eclipse.jdt.annotation.Nullable;
023
024import io.jstach.jstache.JStache;
025import io.jstach.jstache.JStacheConfig;
026import io.jstach.jstache.JStacheContentType;
027import io.jstach.jstache.JStacheContentType.UnspecifiedContentType;
028import io.jstach.jstache.JStacheFormatter;
029import io.jstach.jstache.JStacheFormatter.UnspecifiedFormatter;
030import io.jstach.jstache.JStacheName;
031import io.jstach.jstache.JStachePath;
032import io.jstach.jstachio.JStachio;
033import io.jstach.jstachio.Template;
034import io.jstach.jstachio.TemplateInfo;
035import io.jstach.jstachio.escapers.Html;
036import io.jstach.jstachio.escapers.PlainText;
037import io.jstach.jstachio.formatters.DefaultFormatter;
038import io.jstach.jstachio.formatters.SpecFormatter;
039import io.jstach.jstachio.spi.Templates.TemplateInfos.SimpleTemplateInfo;
040
041/**
042 *
043 * Locates generated templates by their model via reflection.
044 * <p>
045 * This utility class is useful if you plan on implementing your own {@link JStachio} and
046 * or other integrations.
047 *
048 * @apiNote In order to use reflection in a modular setup one must <code>open</code>
049 * packages to the {@link io.jstach.jstachio/ } module.
050 * @author agentgt
051 *
052 */
053public final class Templates {
054
055        private Templates() {
056        }
057
058        /**
059         * Finds a {@link Template} if possible otherwise falling back to a
060         * {@link TemplateInfo} based on annotation metadata. This method is effectively calls
061         * {@link #getTemplate(Class)} first and if that fails possibly tries
062         * {@link #getInfoByReflection(Class)} based on config.
063         * @apiNote Callers can do an <code>instanceof Template t</code> to see if a generated
064         * template was returned instead of the fallback.
065         * @param modelType the models class (<em>the one annotated with {@link JStache} and
066         * not the Templates class</em>)
067         * @param config config used to determine whether or not to fallback
068         * @return the template info which might be a {@link Template} if the generated
069         * template was found.
070         * @throws Exception if any reflection error happes or the template is not found
071         */
072        public static TemplateInfo findTemplate(Class<?> modelType, JStachioConfig config) throws Exception {
073                EnumSet<TemplateLoadStrategy> strategies = EnumSet.noneOf(TemplateLoadStrategy.class);
074
075                for (var s : ALL_STRATEGIES) {
076                        if (s.isEnabled(config)) {
077                                strategies.add(s);
078                        }
079                }
080                var classLoaders = collectClassLoaders(modelType.getClassLoader());
081
082                Logger logger = config.getLogger(Templates.class.getCanonicalName());
083
084                Exception error;
085                try {
086                        Template<?> r = Templates.getTemplate(modelType, strategies, classLoaders, logger);
087                        return r;
088                }
089                catch (Exception e) {
090                        error = e;
091                }
092                if (!config.getBoolean(JStachioConfig.REFLECTION_TEMPLATE_DISABLE)) {
093                        if (logger.isLoggable(Level.WARNING)) {
094                                logger.log(Level.WARNING,
095                                                "Could not find generated template and will try reflection for model type: " + modelType,
096                                                error);
097                        }
098                        return getInfoByReflection(modelType);
099
100                }
101                throw error;
102
103        }
104
105        /**
106         * Finds template info by accessing JStache annotations through reflective lookup.
107         * <p>
108         * This allows you to lookup template meta data <strong>regardless of whether or not
109         * the annotation processor has generated code</strong>. This method is mainly used
110         * for fallback mechanisms and extensions.
111         * <p>
112         * Why might you need the reflective data instead of the static generated meta data?
113         * Well often times the annotation processor in a hot reload environment such as
114         * JRebel, JBoss modules, or Spring Reload has not generated the code from a JStache
115         * model and or it is not desired. This allows reflection based engines like JMustache
116         * to keep working even if code is not generated.
117         * @param modelType the class that is annotated with {@link JStache}
118         * @return template info meta data
119         * @throws Exception if any reflection error happes or the template is not found
120         */
121        public static TemplateInfo getInfoByReflection(Class<?> modelType) throws Exception {
122                return TemplateInfos.templateOf(modelType);
123        }
124
125        /**
126         * Finds a template by reflection or an exception is thrown.
127         * @param <T> the model type
128         * @param clazz the model type
129         * @return the template never <code>null</code>.
130         * @throws NoSuchElementException if the template is not found
131         * @throws Exception if the template is not found or any reflective access errors
132         */
133        public static <T> Template<T> getTemplate(Class<T> clazz) throws Exception {
134                List<ClassLoader> classLoaders = collectClassLoaders(clazz.getClassLoader());
135                return (Template<T>) getTemplate(clazz, ALL_STRATEGIES, classLoaders, JStachioConfig.noopLogger());
136        }
137
138        /**
139         * Finds a template by reflection or an exception is thrown.
140         * @param <T> the model type
141         * @param modelType the model type
142         * @param strategies load strategies
143         * @param classLoaders class loaders to try loading
144         * @param logger used to log attempted strategies. If you do not want to log use
145         * {@link JStachioConfig#noopLogger()}.
146         * @return the template never <code>null</code>.
147         * @throws NoSuchElementException if the template is not found
148         * @throws Exception if the template is not found or any reflective access errors
149         *
150         */
151        public static <T> Template<T> getTemplate(Class<T> modelType, Iterable<TemplateLoadStrategy> strategies,
152                        Iterable<ClassLoader> classLoaders, System.Logger logger) throws Exception {
153
154                for (TemplateLoadStrategy s : strategies) {
155                        if (logger.isLoggable(Level.DEBUG)) {
156                                logger.log(Level.DEBUG, "For modelType: \"" + modelType + "\" trying strategy: \"" + s + "\"");
157                        }
158                        for (ClassLoader classLoader : classLoaders) {
159                                try {
160                                        Template<T> template = s.load(modelType, classLoader);
161                                        if (template != null) {
162                                                return template;
163                                        }
164                                }
165                                catch (ClassNotFoundException | TemplateNotFoundException e) {
166                                        continue;
167                                }
168                        }
169                }
170                throw new TemplateNotFoundException(modelType);
171        }
172
173        static boolean isReflectionTemplate(TemplateInfo template) {
174                if (template instanceof SimpleTemplateInfo si) {
175                        return true;
176                }
177                return false;
178        }
179
180        private static final Set<TemplateLoadStrategy> ALL_STRATEGIES = EnumSet.allOf(TemplateLoadStrategy.class);
181
182        /**
183         * Strategy to load templates dynamically.
184         *
185         * @author agentgt
186         *
187         */
188        public enum TemplateLoadStrategy {
189
190                /**
191                 * Strategy that will try the {@link ServiceLoader} with the SPI of
192                 * {@link TemplateProvider}.
193                 */
194                SERVICE_LOADER() {
195                        @Override
196                        protected <T> @Nullable Template<T> load(Class<T> clazz, ClassLoader classLoader) throws Exception {
197                                return (Template<T>) templateByServiceLoader(clazz, classLoader);
198                        }
199
200                        @Override
201                        protected final boolean isEnabled(JStachioConfig config) {
202                                return !config.getBoolean(JStachioConfig.SERVICELOADER_TEMPLATE_DISABLE);
203                        }
204                },
205                /**
206                 * Strategy that will try no-arg constructor
207                 */
208                CONSTRUCTOR() {
209                        @Override
210                        protected <T> @Nullable Template<T> load(Class<T> clazz, ClassLoader classLoader) throws Exception {
211                                return templateByConstructor(clazz, classLoader);
212                        }
213
214                        @Override
215                        protected final boolean isEnabled(JStachioConfig config) {
216                                return !config.getBoolean(JStachioConfig.REFLECTION_TEMPLATE_DISABLE);
217                        }
218
219                };
220
221                protected abstract <T> @Nullable Template<T> load(Class<T> clazz, ClassLoader classLoader) throws Exception;
222
223                protected abstract boolean isEnabled(JStachioConfig config);
224
225        }
226
227        @SuppressWarnings("unchecked")
228        private static <T> @Nullable Template<T> templateByConstructor(Class<T> clazz, ClassLoader classLoader)
229                        throws Exception {
230                Class<?> implementation = (Class<?>) classLoader.loadClass(resolveName(clazz));
231                Constructor<?> constructor = implementation.getDeclaredConstructor();
232                constructor.setAccessible(true);
233                return (Template<T>) constructor.newInstance();
234        }
235
236        private static String resolveName(Class<?> c) {
237                var a = c.getAnnotation(JStache.class);
238                String cname;
239                if (a == null || a.name().isBlank()) {
240
241                        JStacheName name = findAnnotations(c, JStacheConfig.class).flatMap(config -> Stream.of(config.naming()))
242                                        .findFirst().orElse(null);
243
244                        String prefix = name == null ? JStacheName.UNSPECIFIED : name.prefix();
245
246                        String suffix = name == null ? JStacheName.UNSPECIFIED : name.suffix();
247
248                        prefix = prefix.equals(JStacheName.UNSPECIFIED) ? JStacheName.DEFAULT_PREFIX : prefix;
249                        suffix = suffix.equals(JStacheName.UNSPECIFIED) ? JStacheName.DEFAULT_SUFFIX : suffix;
250
251                        cname = prefix + c.getSimpleName() + suffix;
252                }
253                else {
254                        cname = a.name();
255                }
256                String packageName = c.getPackageName();
257                String fqn = packageName + (packageName.isEmpty() ? "" : ".") + cname;
258                return fqn;
259        }
260
261        private static <A extends Annotation> Stream<A> findAnnotations(Class<?> c, Class<A> annotationClass) {
262                var s = annotationElements(c);
263                return s.filter(p -> p != null).map(p -> p.getAnnotation(annotationClass)).filter(a -> a != null);
264        }
265
266        private static @NonNull Stream<AnnotatedElement> annotationElements(Class<?> c) {
267                Stream<? extends AnnotatedElement> enclosing = enclosing(c).flatMap(Templates::expandUsing);
268                var s = Stream.concat(enclosing, Stream.of(c.getPackage(), c.getModule()));
269                return s;
270        }
271
272        /*
273         * This is to get referenced config of JStacheConfig.using
274         */
275        private static Stream<Class<?>> expandUsing(Class<?> e) {
276
277                JStacheConfig config = e.getAnnotation(JStacheConfig.class);
278                if (config == null) {
279                        return Stream.of(e);
280                }
281                var using = config.using();
282                if (!using.equals(void.class)) {
283                        return Stream.of(e, using);
284                }
285                return Stream.of(e);
286        }
287
288        private static Stream<Class<?>> enclosing(Class<?> e) {
289                AbstractSpliterator<Class<?>> split = new AbstractSpliterator<Class<?>>(Long.MAX_VALUE, 0) {
290                        @Nullable
291                        Class<?> current = e;
292
293                        @Override
294                        public boolean tryAdvance(Consumer<? super Class<?>> action) {
295                                if (current == null) {
296                                        return false;
297                                }
298                                var c = current;
299                                current = current.getEnclosingClass();
300                                action.accept(c);
301                                return true;
302                        }
303                };
304                return StreamSupport.stream(split, false);
305        }
306
307        private static <T> @Nullable Template<?> templateByServiceLoader(Class<T> clazz, ClassLoader classLoader) {
308                ServiceLoader<TemplateProvider> loader = ServiceLoader.load(TemplateProvider.class, classLoader);
309                for (TemplateProvider rp : loader) {
310                        for (var t : rp.provideTemplates()) {
311                                if (t.supportsType(clazz)) {
312                                        return t;
313                                }
314                        }
315                }
316                return null;
317        }
318
319        private static List<ClassLoader> collectClassLoaders(@Nullable ClassLoader classLoader) {
320                return Stream.of(classLoader, Thread.currentThread().getContextClassLoader(), Template.class.getClassLoader())
321                                .filter(cl -> cl != null).toList();
322        }
323
324        @SuppressWarnings("unchecked")
325        static <E extends Throwable> void sneakyThrow(final Throwable x) throws E {
326                throw (E) x;
327        }
328
329        static class TemplateInfos {
330
331                public static TemplateInfo templateOf(Class<?> model) throws Exception {
332                        JStache stache = model.getAnnotation(JStache.class);
333                        if (stache == null) {
334                                throw new IllegalArgumentException(
335                                                "Model class is not annotated with " + JStache.class.getSimpleName() + ". class: " + model);
336                        }
337                        @Nullable
338                        JStachePath pathConfig = resolvePath(model);
339                        String templateString = stache.template();
340
341                        final String templateName = resolveName(model);
342                        String path = stache.path();
343                        String templatePath;
344                        if (templateString.isEmpty() && path.isEmpty()) {
345                                String folder = model.getPackageName().replace('.', '/');
346                                folder = folder.isEmpty() ? folder : folder + "/";
347                                templatePath = folder + model.getSimpleName();
348                        }
349                        else if (!path.isEmpty()) {
350                                templatePath = path;
351                        }
352                        else {
353                                templatePath = "";
354                        }
355                        if (pathConfig != null && !templatePath.isBlank()) {
356                                templatePath = pathConfig.prefix() + templatePath + pathConfig.suffix();
357                        }
358
359                        // Class<?> templateContentType =
360                        // EscaperProvider.INSTANCE.nullToDefault(stache.contentType());
361
362                        var ee = EscaperProvider.INSTANCE.providesFromModelType(model, stache);
363                        Function<String, String> templateEscaper = ee.getValue();
364                        Class<?> templateContentType = ee.getKey();
365
366                        Function<@Nullable Object, String> templateFormatter = FormatterProvider.INSTANCE
367                                        .providesFromModelType(model, stache).getValue();
368
369                        long lastLoaded = System.currentTimeMillis();
370                        return new SimpleTemplateInfo( //
371                                        templateName, //
372                                        templatePath, //
373                                        templateString, //
374                                        templateContentType, //
375                                        templateEscaper, //
376                                        templateFormatter, //
377                                        lastLoaded, //
378                                        model);
379
380                }
381
382                private static JStachePath resolvePath(Class<?> model) {
383                        return annotationElements(model).map(TemplateInfos::resolvePathOnElement).filter(p -> p != null).findFirst()
384                                        .orElse(null);
385                }
386
387                private static @Nullable JStachePath resolvePathOnElement(AnnotatedElement a) {
388                        var path = a.getAnnotation(JStachePath.class);
389                        if (path != null) {
390                                return path;
391                        }
392                        var config = a.getAnnotation(JStacheConfig.class);
393                        if (config != null && config.pathing().length > 0) {
394                                return config.pathing()[0];
395                        }
396                        return null;
397                }
398
399                sealed interface StaticProvider<P> {
400
401                        default @Nullable Class<?> autoToNull(@Nullable Class<?> type) {
402                                if (type == null) {
403                                        return null;
404                                }
405                                if (type.equals(autoProvider())) {
406                                        return null;
407                                }
408                                return type;
409                        }
410
411                        default Class<?> nullToDefault(@Nullable Class<?> type) {
412                                Class<?> c = autoToNull(type);
413                                if (c == null) {
414                                        return defaultProvider();
415                                }
416                                return c;
417                        }
418
419                        String providesMethod(Class<?> type);
420
421                        Class<?> autoProvider();
422
423                        Class<?> defaultProvider();
424
425                        @Nullable
426                        Class<?> providerFromJStache(JStache jstache);
427
428                        Class<?> providerFromConfig(JStacheConfig config);
429
430                        default Class<?> findProvider(Class<?> modelType, JStache jstache) {
431                                @Nullable
432                                Class<?> provider = autoToNull(providerFromJStache(jstache));
433                                if (provider != null) {
434                                        return provider;
435                                }
436                                provider = findAnnotations(modelType, JStacheConfig.class)
437                                                .map(config -> autoToNull(providerFromConfig(config))).filter(p -> p != null).findFirst()
438                                                .orElse(null);
439                                return nullToDefault(provider);
440                        }
441
442                        default Entry<Class<?>, P> providesFromModelType(Class<?> modelType, JStache jstache) throws Exception {
443                                var t = findProvider(modelType, jstache);
444                                return Map.entry(t, provides(t));
445                        }
446
447                        @SuppressWarnings("unchecked")
448                        default P provides(Class<?> type) throws Exception {
449                                String provides = providesMethod(type);
450                                var method = type.getMethod(provides);
451                                Object r = method.invoke(provides);
452                                return (P) r;
453                        }
454
455                }
456
457                enum EscaperProvider implements StaticProvider<Function<String, String>> {
458
459                        INSTANCE;
460
461                        @Override
462                        public Class<?> autoProvider() {
463                                return UnspecifiedContentType.class;
464                        }
465
466                        @Override
467                        public Class<?> defaultProvider() {
468                                return Html.class;
469                        }
470
471                        @Override
472                        public @Nullable Class<?> providerFromJStache(JStache jstache) {
473                                return null;
474                        }
475
476                        @Override
477                        public Class<?> providerFromConfig(JStacheConfig config) {
478                                return config.contentType();
479                        }
480
481                        @Override
482                        public String providesMethod(Class<?> type) {
483                                JStacheContentType a = type.getAnnotation(JStacheContentType.class);
484                                return a.providesMethod();
485                        }
486
487                        public Function<String, String> provides(@Nullable Class<?> contentType) throws Exception {
488                                contentType = nullToDefault(contentType);
489                                if (contentType.equals(Html.class)) {
490                                        return Html.provider();
491                                }
492                                else if (contentType.equals(PlainText.class)) {
493                                        return PlainText.provider();
494                                }
495                                return StaticProvider.super.provides(contentType);
496                        }
497
498                }
499
500                enum FormatterProvider implements StaticProvider<Function<@Nullable Object, String>> {
501
502                        INSTANCE;
503
504                        @Override
505                        public Class<?> autoProvider() {
506                                return UnspecifiedFormatter.class;
507                        }
508
509                        @Override
510                        public Class<?> defaultProvider() {
511                                return DefaultFormatter.class;
512                        }
513
514                        @Override
515                        public @Nullable Class<?> providerFromJStache(JStache jstache) {
516                                return null;
517                        }
518
519                        @Override
520                        public Class<?> providerFromConfig(JStacheConfig config) {
521                                return config.formatter();
522                        }
523
524                        @Override
525                        public String providesMethod(Class<?> type) {
526                                JStacheFormatter a = type.getAnnotation(JStacheFormatter.class);
527                                return a.providesMethod();
528                        }
529
530                        public Function<@Nullable Object, String> provides(@Nullable Class<?> formatterType) throws Exception {
531                                formatterType = nullToDefault(formatterType);
532                                if (formatterType.equals(DefaultFormatter.class)) {
533                                        return DefaultFormatter.provider();
534                                }
535                                else if (formatterType.equals(SpecFormatter.class)) {
536                                        return SpecFormatter.provider();
537                                }
538                                return StaticProvider.super.provides(formatterType);
539                        }
540
541                }
542
543                record SimpleTemplateInfo( //
544                                String templateName, //
545                                String templatePath, //
546                                String templateString, //
547                                Class<?> templateContentType, //
548                                Function<String, String> templateEscaper, //
549                                Function<@Nullable Object, String> templateFormatter, //
550                                long lastLoaded, //
551                                Class<?> modelClass) implements TemplateInfo {
552
553                        @Override
554                        public boolean supportsType(Class<?> type) {
555                                return modelClass().isAssignableFrom(type);
556                        }
557
558                }
559
560        }
561
562}
